relationships.description: Sender sharing political commentary with recipient
Rabbi criticizing political leanings of Jewish Democrats

analysis.purpose: To share and endorse a political commentary article criticizing Democratic policies and the 2012 election outcome
analysis.significance: Shows political perspectives circulating among business/professional circles regarding economic policy, immigration, and Jewish voting patterns

notable_quotes: "The simplest reason why Romney lost was because it is impossible to compete against free stuff."
"Almost half of the population has no skin in the game - they don't care about high taxes, promoting business, or creating jobs."
"The problems we face today are there because the people who work for a living are outnumbered by those who vote for a living."

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: Document contains political commentary and opinion, no illegal activity discussed

details: References to Israel National News publication
Mentions 'chattering classes' and media analysis of election

public_knowledge.context: Political commentary about 2012 presidential election and demographic trends that was widely discussed in public discourse

analysis.summary: Terry Kafka forwards a political commentary article by Rabbi Steven Pruzansky that analyzes the 2012 presidential election results, criticizing Democratic policies as promoting dependency on government benefits and expressing concern about changing American demographics and values.
